content: भज् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (भजति-ते but usually <ab>Atm.</ab> only; बभाज, भेजे, अभाक्षीत्, अभक्त, भक्ष्याति-ते, भक्त) {@--1@} ({%a%}) To share, distribute, divide; भजेरन् पैतृकं रिक्थं <ls>Ms. 9. 104</ls>; न तत्पुत्रैर्मजेत्सार्धं <ls n="Ms. 9.">209</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">119.</ls> ({%b%}) To assign, allot, apportion; गायत्रीमग्नयेऽभजत् <ls>Ait. Br.</ls> {@--2@} To obtain for oneself, share in, partake of; पित्र्यं वा भजते शीलं <ls>Ms. 10. 59.</ls> {@--3@} To accept, receive; <ls>Māl. 5. 25.</ls> {@--4@} ({%a%}) To resort to, betake oneself to, have recourse to; शिलातलं भेजे <ls>K. 179</ls>; मातर्लक्ष्मि भजस्व कंचिदपरं <ls>Bh. 3. 64</ls>; न कश्चिद्वर्णनामपथमपकृष्टोपि भजते <ls>Ś. 5. 10</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 83</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 28.</ls> ({%b%}) To practise, follow, observe; भेजे धर्ममनातुरः <ls>R. 1. 21</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 10.</ls> {@--5@} To enjoy, possess, have, suffer, experience, entertain; विधुरपि भजतेतरां कलंकं <ls>Bv. 1. 74</ls>; न भेजिरे भीमविषेण भीतिं <ls>Bh. 2. 80</ls>; व्यक्तिं भजंत्यापगाः <ls>Ś. 7. 8</ls>; अभितप्तमयोपि मार्दवं भजते कैव कथा शरीरिषु <ls>R. 8. 43</ls>; <ls>Māl. 3. 9</ls>; <ls>U. 1. 35.</ls> {@--6@} To wait or attend upon, serve; <ls>R. 2. 23</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 181</ls>; <ls>Mk. 1. 32.</ls> {@--7@} To adore, honour, worship (as a god). {@--8@} To choose, select, perfer, accept; संतः परीक्ष्यान्यतरद्भजंते <ls>M. 1. 2.</ls> {@--9@} To enjoy carnally; <ls>Pt. 4. 50.</ls> {@--10@} To be attached or devoted to; <ls>Pt. 1. 35.</ls> {@--11@} To take possession of. {@--12@} To fall to the lot of any one. {@--13@} To grant, bestow. {@--14@} To supply, furnish (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--15@} To favour. {@--16@} To decide in favour of, declare for. {@--17@} To love, court (affection). {@--18@} To apply oneself to, be engaged in. {@--19@} To cook, dress (food). {@--20@} To employ, engage. (The meanings of this root are variously modified according to the noun with which it is connected: {%--<ab>e. g.</ab>%} निद्रां भज् to go to sleep; मूर्छां भज् to swoon; भावं भज् to show love for &c. &c.). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To divide. {@--2@} To put to flight, pursue. {@--3@} To cook, dress. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (भाजयति-ते) , regarded by some as the {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} of भज् I {@--1@} To cook. {@--2@} To give.
